classic.name: Notre-Dame Basilica of Montreal
classic.description: Dating from 1824, this massive church features vibrant stained glass & hosts concert performances.
classic.address: 110 R. Notre Dame O, Montréal, QC H2Y 1T1, Canada

classic.name: Saint Joseph's Oratory of Mount Royal
classic.description: Grand domed Catholic church with an art museum, gardens & organ concerts, plus tours & events.
classic.address: 3800 Chem. Queen Mary, Montréal, QC H3V 1H6, Canada

classic.name: Place des Arts
classic.description: Multi-venue complex used by jazz & comedy festivals & prominent groups like the Opéra de Montréal.
classic.address: 175 Rue Sainte-Catherine O, Montréal, QC H2X 3X5, Canada

classic.name: Montreal Museum of Fine Arts
classic.description: Spacious museum showcasing Québec & Canadian visual works, plus international contemporary art.
classic.address: 1380 Rue Sherbrooke O, Montréal, QC H3G 1J5, Canada

classic.name: Jean Talon Market
classic.description: Established open-air market with many vendors selling produce, meats, cheeses, fish & baked goods.
classic.address: 7070 Av. Henri-Julien, Montréal, QC H2S 3A3, Canada

classic.name: Jardin botanique de Montréal
classic.description: 75 hectares of native & exotic flora, with 10 themed greenhouses & a Chinese lantern garden.
classic.address: 4101 R. Sherbrooke E, Montréal, QC H1X 2B2, Canada

classic.name: Parc Jean-Drapeau
classic.description: Park made up of 2 islands that are home to multiple attractions, venues & museums.

classic.name: Montreal Museum of Archaeology and History
classic.description: Modern museum with archaeological digs & interactive exhibits in historical buildings.
classic.address: 350 Pl. Royale, Montréal, QC H2Y 3Y5, Canada

classic.name: Vieux-Port de Montréal
classic.description: Historic riverfront complex featuring stores & restaurants, plus art exhibits, events & activities.
classic.address: 333 Rue de la Commune O, Montréal, QC H2Y 2E2, Canada

classic.name: Rialto Theatre
classic.description: Dinner theatre & live events in a neo-baroque heritage movie hall with cabaret seating & a balcony.
classic.address: 5723 Av. du Parc, Montréal, QC H2V 4H2, Canada
